en: That team has never played as well as they played today.
zh: 那个队从来没有像今天这样打得好。

en: The team will go ahead with the plan soon.
zh: 球队很快就会继续执行该计划。

en: The team carried out the project.
zh: 该团队执行了该项目。

en: Each player on the team has his own bat.
zh: 球队中的每个球员都有自己的球棒。

en: The manager of the team quit suddenly.
zh: 该团队的经理突然辞职了。

en: That cheese is made from sheep's milk.
zh: 那种奶酪是用羊奶制成的。

en: The cheesecake tasted too sweet.
zh: 那个芝士蛋糕尝起来太甜了。

en: The tanker has a small crew.
zh: 这艘油轮上的船员很少。

en: That made him govern himself.
zh: 那让他能够自我约束。

en: Therefore many people passed away.
zh: 因此，很多人去世了。

en: I have enough time for that.
zh: 我有足够的时间做这件事。

en: That made the problem all the more complicated.
zh: 这使得问题更加复杂。

en: And thus his attention was distracted from the sight.
zh: 因此，他的注意力从景象中分散了。

en: It'll cost me my job.
zh: 这会让我丢掉工作。

en: Is there much water in the dam?
zh: 水坝里有很多水吗？

en: There used to be a village here before the dam was made.
zh: 在水坝建成之前，这里曾经有一个村庄。

en: The taxi abruptly turned left.
zh: 出租车突然向左转弯。

en: Thanks to the taxi driver, we had a very wonderful time in London.
zh: 多亏了出租车司机，我们在伦敦度过了一段非常美好的时光。

en: It seems that the diamond is real.
zh: 看来那颗钻石是真的。

en: The diamond was valued at 5,000 dollars.
zh: 那颗钻石的价值为5000美元。

en: The diamond was discovered by a boy in 1873.
zh: 那颗钻石是1873年一个男孩发现的。

en: That diamond ring cost an arm and a leg.
zh: 那枚钻戒非常昂贵。

en: A man of that cut will always succeed.
zh: 那种人总会成功的。

en: The sofa takes up too much room.
zh: 沙发占用的空间太大了。

en: Don't sit down on the sofa.
zh: 不要坐在沙发上。

en: The goal of the center should be to train young people from other countries within a specific time period.
zh: 这个中心的目标应该是在特定的时间内培训来自其他国家的年轻人。

en: It looks nice with your trousers.
zh: 这条裤子和你很相配，看起来不错。

en: The athlete had a strong build.
zh: 这位运动员体格健壮。

en: This sport got more and more popular.
zh: 这项运动变得越来越受欢迎。

en: The space shuttles were designed to go to a space station.
zh: 航天飞机的设计目的是前往空间站。

en: The speeding car missed the child, who ran out into the road, by only a hairsbreadth.
zh: 超速行驶的汽车险些撞到跑到路上的孩子，差之毫厘。

en: You should take part in that speech contest.
zh: 你应该参加那个演讲比赛。

en: I was able to grasp the main points of the speech.
zh: 我能够抓住演讲的要点。

en: Hand me the wrench.
zh: 把扳手递给我。

en: No sooner had the spy returned home than he was told to go to another country.
zh: 间谍刚回到家，就被告知要去另一个国家。

en: The spy burned the papers.
zh: 间谍烧毁了文件。

en: The stewardess can speak French after a fashion.
zh: 这位空姐勉强会说法语。

en: The steak is well done.
zh: 这块牛排全熟了。

en: He is an indispensable member for the staff.
zh: 他是员工中不可或缺的一员。

en: The skater spun round and round on the ice.
zh: 滑冰者在冰上旋转了一圈又一圈。

en: That sukiyaki dinner was a real treat.
zh: 那顿寿喜烧晚餐真是享受。

en: The scandal was fatal to his political future.
zh: 这丑闻对他的政治前途是致命的。

en: The scandal was an obstacle to his promotion.
zh: 这丑闻是他晋升的障碍。

en: That scandal will be known to everybody in the course of time.
zh: 随着时间的推移，这个丑闻将会被所有人知道。

en: The scandal robbed him of a chance to become President.
zh: 这丑闻剥夺了他成为总统的机会。

en: That scandal cost him his reputation.
zh: 这丑闻让他失去了名誉。

en: The scandal detracted from his reputation.
zh: 这丑闻损害了他的声誉。

en: The skirt clings tight to her legs.
zh: 这条裙子紧贴着她的腿。

en: The skirt is too wide for me.
zh: 这条裙子对我来说太肥了。

en: The soup needs more salt.
zh: 这汤需要多加点盐。

en: The supermarket has a large stock of merchandise.
zh: 这家超市有大量的商品库存。

en: The supermarket is open all days except Sunday.
zh: 这家超市除了星期天，每天都营业。

en: The supermarket opens at ten o'clock.
zh: 这家超市十点开门。

en: We have a wide choice of fruits at the supermarket.
zh: 我们超市有各种各样的水果。

en: The suit becomes him well.
zh: 这套西装很适合他。

en: One of the suitcases is completely empty.
zh: 其中一个行李箱是完全空的。

en: The serious job shortage is also affecting those illegal foreign workers.
zh: 严重的就业短缺也影响到了那些非法外国劳工。

en: That white dress looks good on you.
zh: 你穿那件白色连衣裙很好看。

en: I am very pleased at the news.
zh: 我听到这个消息非常高兴。

en: The shock robbed her of her speech.
zh: 震惊使她说不出话来。

en: The show was an electrifying hit.
zh: 这场演出非常轰动。

en: The show was far from being a failure.
zh: 这场演出远非失败。

en: The show will be a great feature of tonight's program.
zh: 这场演出将是今晚节目的一个亮点。

en: The show will be on the air at 7 p.m.
zh: 这个节目将在晚上七点播出。

en: The show was pleasing to the audience.
zh: 这场演出很受观众欢迎。

en: The show was wonderful. You should have seen it.
zh: 这场演出太精彩了，你应该去看。

en: The rest of the show was not particularly distinguished.
zh: 节目的其余部分并不特别出色。

en: I guarantee the success of the show.
zh: 我保证演出成功。

en: The audience was very much entertained by the show.
zh: 观众非常喜欢这个节目。

en: The joke amused the audience.
zh: 这个笑话逗乐了观众。

en: There were some who didn't see the joke.
zh: 有些人没听懂这个笑话。

en: I had a lick at the jam.
zh: 我舔了一口果酱。

en: Wash the shirt in soapy water and the stains will come out.
zh: 用肥皂水洗这件衬衫，污渍就会洗掉。

en: The shirt is large for me.
zh: 这件衬衫对我来说太大了。

en: The shirt needs pressing.
zh: 这件衬衫需要熨烫。

en: The journalist took liberties with the facts he had gathered.
zh: 这位记者随意篡改了他收集的事实。

en: The journalist is what you call a cosmopolitan.
zh: 这位记者就是你们所说的国际化人士。

en: The protection circuit is built into the system.
zh: 保护电路内置于系统中。

en: The system is working very well now.
zh: 现在这个系统运行得非常好。

en: A protection system has been built into this circuit.
zh: 这个电路中内置了一个保护系统。

en: The gesture fetched a laugh from the audience.
zh: 这个姿势引得观众一阵大笑。

en: Those jets were faster than lightning.
zh: 那些喷气式飞机比闪电还快。

en: The German Shepherd was limping down the street.
zh: 那只德国牧羊犬一瘸一拐地走在街上。

en: The jet plane reached Narita an hour late.
zh: 那架喷气式飞机晚了一个小时才到达成田机场。

en: The jet plane had 500 passengers on board.
zh: 那架喷气式飞机载有500名乘客。

en: The monkey climbed up a tree.
zh: 猴子爬上了一棵树。

en: The monkey took a banana by means of the stick.
zh: 猴子用棍子拿了一根香蕉。

en: The soccer game attracted a large crowd.
zh: 这场足球比赛吸引了大量观众。

en: The circus entertained us very much.
zh: 马戏团给我们带来了很多乐趣。

en: The computer is of great use.
zh: 电脑非常有用。

en: The computer was very useful.
zh: 这台电脑非常有用。

en: The computer is new.
zh: 这台电脑是新的。

en: The computer is up to date.
zh: 这台电脑是最新的。

en: The computer was so outdated that it was good for nothing.
zh: 那台电脑太旧了，毫无用处。

en: That computer is what we call a robot.
zh: 那台电脑就是我们所说的机器人。

en: The computer can detect 200 types of error.
zh: 这台电脑可以检测出200种类型的错误。

en: The computer's color is red.
zh: 这台电脑的颜色是红色的。

en: The successful concert tour established her reputation as a singer.
zh: 成功的巡回演唱会确立了她作为歌手的声誉。

en: The concert will take place next summer.
zh: 音乐会将于明年夏天举行。

en: The concert will take place next spring.
zh: 音乐会将于明年春天举行。

en: The concert was broadcast live.
zh: 音乐会进行了现场直播。

en: The concert came to an end at ten o'clock.
zh: 音乐会在十点钟结束了。

en: When will the concert be held?
zh: 音乐会什么时候举行？

en: How did you get tickets for the concert?
zh: 你是怎么弄到音乐会门票的？

en: I managed to acquire two tickets for the concert.
zh: 我设法弄到了两张音乐会的门票。

en: There must have been a large audience at the concert.
zh: 音乐会现场肯定有很多观众。

en: There were a lot of people at the concert.
zh: 音乐会现场人很多。

en: I wish I had bought a ticket for the concert.
zh: 我真希望我买了音乐会的票。

en: At that time, my mother was younger than I am now.
zh: 那时候，我妈妈比现在的我年轻。

en: She was a strong, fast runner then.
zh: 那时她是个强壮、跑得很快的跑步者。

en: For a day, I had been overworking myself.
zh: 有一天，我一直在过度劳累。

en: He was always drinking in those days.
zh: 那些日子他总是喝酒。

en: I was only a little child then.
zh: 那时我还是个小孩子。

en: Long skirts were in fashion in those days.
zh: 那时流行长裙。

en: We didn't have TV in those days.
zh: 那时我们没有电视。

en: At that time, Mexico was not yet independent of Spain.
zh: 那时，墨西哥还没有脱离西班牙独立。

en: I will have read the novels through by that time.
zh: 到那时，我应该已经读完了这些小说。

en: I went to school on foot in those days.
zh: 那时我走路去上学。

en: In those days, there were no radios.
zh: 那时没有收音机。

en: There was no TV or radio in those days.
zh: 那时没有电视或收音机。

en: In those days, he was a student.
zh: 那时他还是个学生。

en: The gorilla was one year old at the time.
zh: 那时那只大猩猩一岁了。

en: The columnist raked up some old gossip.
zh: 那位专栏作家翻出了一些旧的流言蜚语。

en: The garbage-can gave off a bad smell.
zh: 垃圾桶散发出难闻的气味。

en: The garbage is giving off a terrible smell.
zh: 垃圾散发出难闻的气味。

en: The child has a keen sense of hearing.
zh: 这孩子听觉很敏锐。

en: Tell me about it.
zh: 跟我说说吧。

en: I'm very sad to hear that.
zh: 听到这个消息我很难过。

en: Ought I to tell it to him?
zh: 我应该告诉他吗？

en: Keep it in mind.
zh: 记住它。

en: The more I think of it, the less I like it.
zh: 我越想越不喜欢。

en: I am feeling up-lifted at the thought of it.
zh: 一想到这件事，我就感到振奋。

en: It's up to you to decide the matter.
zh: 这件事由你来决定。

en: Chew it over for a while and let me know what you think.
zh: 仔细考虑一段时间，然后告诉我你的想法。

en: It is no good talking about it.
zh: 谈论这件事没有用。

en: Ponder deeply over it.
zh: 认真思考它。

en: The proverb is familiar.
zh: 这句谚语很常见。

en: The saying is quite familiar to us.
zh: 这句谚语我们很熟悉。

en: I don't want to make an issue of it.
zh: 我不想把这件事变成一个问题。

en: That does not prevent them from taking just as many books.
zh: 这并不能阻止他们拿走同样多的书。

en: Did you learn it from him?
zh: 你是从他那里学来的吗？

en: Don't mention the matter to him.
zh: 别跟他提起这件事。

en: That can be said of mankind at large.
zh: 这句话适用于整个人类。

en: You don't have to tell that to your parents.
zh: 你不必告诉你的父母这件事。

en: You can bet your boots on that.
zh: 你可以肯定地说。

en: I'll leave that to you.
zh: 我把它交给你处理。

en: I'm quite sure of that.
zh: 我对此非常肯定。

en: I heard it on good authority.
zh: 我是从可靠的消息来源听说的。

en: I said nothing about the matter.
zh: 我什么也没说。

en: I can't put up with it any longer.
zh: 我再也无法忍受了。

en: Please think no more about it.
zh: 请不要再想这件事了。

en: The matter is still under discussion.
zh: 这件事还在讨论中。

en: The remark was aimed at you.
zh: 那句话是针对你的。

en: I can never bring myself to talk about it.
zh: 我永远也无法提起这件事。

en: You may have heard of that.
zh: 你可能听说过那件事。

en: It must have something to do with money.
zh: 这肯定和钱有关。

en: I have a faint recollection of the event.
zh: 我对这件事只有模糊的印象。

en: The matter does not concern me.
zh: 这件事与我无关。

en: Let me think it over for a couple of days.
zh: 让我想几天。

en: I'll make sure of it.
zh: 我会确认一下的。

en: People are getting more concerned about the matter.
zh: 人们越来越关心这件事了。

en: She thought it was necessary that she should do something about it.
zh: 她认为她有必要为此做些什么。

en: I think she was wrong in regard to that.
zh: 我认为她在那件事上错了。

en: As regards the matter, I know nothing.
zh: 关于这件事，我一无所知。

en: There's no mistake about it.
zh: 这件事绝对没错。

en: In addition to that, he failed the examination.
zh: 除此之外，他考试不及格了。

en: There is no external influence in that.
zh: 这件事没有外部影响。

en: I give you my word not to tell anyone about it.
zh: 我向你保证不会告诉任何人。

en: What did Father say about it?
zh: 爸爸对这件事怎么说？

en: I'll tell you everything about it.
zh: 我会告诉你关于这件事的一切。

en: I'll let you know all about it later on.
zh: 稍后我会告诉你关于这件事的一切。

en: Tell me everything that you can think about it.
zh: 把你所能想到的关于这件事的一切都告诉我。

en: It is no use pretending you know nothing about it.
zh: 假装你对此一无所知是没有用的。

en: Could you please give me some more examples of that?
zh: 你能否再给我一些这方面的例子？

en: Did he say anything about it to you?
zh: 他有没有对你提起这件事？

en: He is apparently responsible for it.
zh: 显然他对此事负责。

en: I've heard all about it.
zh: 关于这件事，我全都听说了。

en: I am to be blamed for that matter.
zh: 这件事应该怪我。

en: I know as much about it as the man in the moon.
zh: 我对这件事一无所知。

en: I found it best to say nothing about the matter.
zh: 我觉得最好对这件事保持沉默。

en: There is no doubt about it.
zh: 这件事毫无疑问。

en: I agree with you about that.
zh: 关于那件事，我同意你的看法。

en: Let's discuss the matter later.
zh: 我们稍后再讨论这件事吧。

en: Tell me truly what you think about it.
zh: 请你真诚地告诉我你对这件事的看法。

en: Tell me as much about that as possible.
zh: 请尽可能多地告诉我关于那件事的信息。

en: Tell me everything about it.
zh: 请告诉我关于这件事的一切。

en: Take my word for it.
zh: 相信我。

en: I'll bet anybody on that.
zh: 我敢跟任何人打赌。

en: That reminds me of my father.
zh: 那让我想起了我的父亲。

en: I want to talk to him about it.
zh: 我想和他谈谈这件事。

en: You don't need to worry about it.
zh: 你不需要担心这件事。

en: I remember him saying something about that.
zh: 我记得他说过一些关于这件事的事情。

en: Let there be no mistake about it.
zh: 这件事不容有误。

en: You leave me no choice in the matter.
zh: 这件事你让我别无选择。

en: They often quarreled with their brothers and husbands over the matter.
zh: 他们经常因为这件事和他们的兄弟和丈夫争吵。

en: That shows how little we know of ourselves.
zh: 这表明我们对自己的了解是多么的少。

en: Do you have any trouble with that?
zh: 你在这方面有什么困难吗？

en: Something must be done about it in no time.
zh: 必须立即采取行动解决这件事。

en: You are mistaken about that.
zh: 你在这件事上弄错了。

en: It is mean of you to tell a lie about it.
zh: 你撒谎说这件事，真是太卑鄙了。

en: I'm to be blamed for that matter.
zh: 那件事该怪我。

en: That adds a new dimension to our problem.
zh: 那给我们的问题增加了一个新的维度。

en: The matter is nothing more than an accident.
zh: 这件事只不过是一场意外。

en: The matter weighs heavy on my mind.
zh: 这件事让我心事重重。

en: The cottage reminded me of the happy times I had spent with her.
zh: 那个小屋让我想起了我和她一起度过的快乐时光。

en: Don't drop that cup.
zh: 别把那个杯子掉了。

en: The glass was dashed to pieces.
zh: 玻璃被打得粉碎。

en: There is a crack in the glass.
zh: 玻璃上有裂缝。

en: The burglar was caught in the act of prying open the window.
zh: 窃贼在撬窗户时被当场抓获。

en: The coffee shop is my favorite haunt.
zh: 那家咖啡店是我最喜欢去的地方。

en: The coffee was so hot that I couldn't drink it.
zh: 咖啡太烫了，我喝不了。

en: The coffee was not much to my liking.
zh: 那咖啡不太合我的口味。

en: That coffee smells good.
zh: 那咖啡闻起来很香。

en: The coffee was too hot for me to drink.
zh: 咖啡太烫了，我喝不了。

en: The coffee shop is closed while the air conditioning is under repair.
zh: 咖啡店因空调维修而暂停营业。

en: The coat is not mine.
zh: 这件外套不是我的。

en: That coat is just the style I've been looking for.
zh: 那件外套正是我一直在寻找的款式。

en: It is fun to play baseball.
zh: 玩棒球很有趣。

en: The coach made him a good pitcher.
zh: 教练把他培养成了一个优秀的投手。

en: What places does that tour visit?
zh: 那个旅游团都去哪些地方？

en: The miser opened the box to find his money stolen.
zh: 吝啬鬼打开盒子，发现他的钱被偷了。

en: The game took on among old people.
zh: 这个游戏在老年人中流行起来。

en: The game drew a good crowd.
zh: 这场比赛吸引了很多观众。

en: I found the game easy.
zh: 我觉得这个游戏很简单。

en: How did the game come out?
zh: 比赛结果如何？

en: The game excited lots of people.
zh: 这个游戏让很多人感到兴奋。

en: Tell me how to play the game.
zh: 告诉我怎么玩这个游戏。

en: I wish we had won the game.
zh: 我希望我们赢了这场比赛。

en: Two can play at that game.
zh: 你这样做，我也能这样做。(字面意思是：两个人都能玩这个游戏。)

en: It turned out that the cards were stacked against her from the beginning of the game.
zh: 结果表明，从一开始，她就处于不利地位。(字面意思是：结果表明，从游戏一开始，牌就对她不利。)

en: Let me relieve you of that case.
zh: 我来帮你卸下那个案子吧。

en: The occasion demands a cool head.
zh: 这种场合需要冷静的头脑。

en: The cake tastes sweet.
zh: 这蛋糕尝起来很甜。

en: There was some taste of lemon in the cake.
zh: 这蛋糕里有一些柠檬的味道。

en: Don't cut the cake with a knife.
zh: 不要用刀切蛋糕。

en: The cakes may be sold out soon.
zh: 蛋糕可能很快就卖完了。

en: The group is running on the beach.
zh: 这群人在海滩上跑步。

en: I want some cake.
zh: 我想要一些蛋糕。

zh: 有没有什么好方法可以快速记住我们的台词？

en: Jelly sets as it cools.
zh: 果冻冷却后会凝固。

en: The cement will set in a couple of hours.
zh: 水泥会在几个小时内凝固。

en: It will take awhile for the cement to dry before we can use it to park the car.
zh: 水泥需要一段时间才能干透，我们才能用它来停车。

en: You should have enough sense not to drink, at least during your illness.
zh: 你至少应该有足够的理智在生病期间不喝酒。

en: At the very least, I'd like to be able to have everyday conversations.
zh: 至少，我希望能进行日常对话。

en: He might at least apologize.
zh: 他至少应该道歉。

en: Can't you wait just ten more minutes?
zh: 你不能再等十分钟吗？

en: Please forward this message along with the seminar information to the appropriate managers in your firm.
zh: 请将此消息连同研讨会信息转发给贵公司的相关经理。

en: Do keep practicing!
zh: 请继续练习！

en: Cicadas are singing.
zh: 知了在唱歌。

en: Do come by all means.
zh: 请务必光临。

en: I have appealed to him to visit but he didn't come.
zh: 我请他来拜访，但他没来。

en: We would love to work with you.
zh: 我们很乐意与您合作。

en: You must come and have a chat with us.
zh: 你一定要来和我们聊聊。

en: I strongly suggest you visit Kyoto.
zh: 我强烈建议你去京都看看。

en: You should have visited Kyoto.
zh: 你应该去京都看看的。

en: Try by all means.
zh: 务必试试看。

en: We request your attendance at the meeting.
zh: 我们恳请您出席会议。

en: Do come and see us again.
zh: 请再来拜访我们。

en: I do hope you'll come again.
zh: 我真诚地希望你能再来。

en: You have to have a piece of pie.
zh: 你一定要来一块派。

en: You must come to the party by all means.
zh: 你一定要来参加派对。

en: If you must, you must.
zh: 如果你非要这样做，那就做吧。

en: Please be sure to bring some of your friends to the party.
zh: 请务必带一些你的朋友来参加派对。

en: I will do it by all means.
zh: 我一定尽力而为。

en: Try it by all means.
zh: 务必尝试一下。

en: Do it by all means.
zh: 务必去做。

en: You really must see that movie.
zh: 你真的应该去看那部电影。

en: I'd love to see the movie.
zh: 我很想去看那部电影。

en: Do write to me soon!
zh: 请尽快给我写信！

en: You must conduct the orchestra well.
zh: 你一定要好好指挥乐团。

en: I'd love to dance with you.
zh: 我很想和你跳舞。

en: I'd very much like to exchange e-mail with you.
zh: 我很想和你交换电子邮件。

en: Do come and see us tomorrow.
zh: 明天一定要来看我们。

en: Do come and visit us.
zh: 一定要来拜访我们。

en: I would very much like to go.
zh: 我很想去。

en: The general strike paralyzed the whole country.
zh: 全国大罢工使整个国家瘫痪了。

en: Strike the set.
zh: 拆除舞台布景。

en: I shall never give up.
zh: 我决不放弃。

en: Don't touch me with your soapy hands.
zh: 别用你那满是肥皂的手碰我。

en: He's the very model of an aggressive salesman.
zh: 他简直是咄咄逼人的推销员的典范。

en: An impatient driver forced his way through the crossing against the red light.
zh: 一个不耐烦的司机闯红灯强行通过十字路口。

en: We'd better try to sell or give away all these white elephants we've collected.
zh: 我们最好试着卖掉或送掉所有这些我们收集来的昂贵而无用的东西。

en: He has failed after all his labors.
zh: 经过他所有的努力，他还是失败了。

en: If you could do it at all, I'd like you to do it.
zh: 如果你能做的话，我希望你能做。

en: After a mad dash down the stairway, I missed my train by a second.
zh: 疯狂地冲下楼梯后，我错过火车一秒钟。

en: Though I went to see her all the way in the rain, she was out.
zh: 虽然我冒雨去看她，但她出去了。

en: All my pains went for nothing.
zh: 我的所有努力都白费了。

en: All my pains were in vain.
zh: 我的所有努力都是徒劳的。

en: I am sorry, but I have someone coming.
zh: 很抱歉，我有人要来。

en: After I got all worked up about ordering in English, I walked in the store and they greeted me with "Irasshaimase!" I felt, like, "What the ...?"
zh: 当我好不容易鼓起勇气用英语点餐时，我走进店里，他们却用“欢迎光临！”迎接我。我当时就想，“搞什么鬼...？”

en: Cezanne is famous for his landscapes.
zh: 塞尚以他的风景画而闻名。

en: Sexual harassment has now become a social issue.
zh: 性骚扰现在已经成为一个社会问题。

en: I have a chest cold.
zh: 我得了胸闷感冒。

en: Do you have cough drops?
zh: 你有润喉糖吗？

en: I have a cough.
zh: 我咳嗽。

en: I can't stop coughing.
zh: 我止不住咳嗽。

en: I had a bad cough, so I took the bitter medicine.
zh: 我咳嗽得很厉害，所以我吃了苦药。

en: I don't want to rush you, but let's try to catch the next bus.
zh: 我不想催你，但我们尽量赶上下一班公交车吧。

en: When I was in Salem, I would often play tennis with John.
zh: 当我在塞勒姆的时候，我经常和约翰一起打网球。

en: The salesman talked my parents into buying a set of encyclopedias.
zh: 那个推销员说服我的父母买了一套百科全书。

en: Salesmen are usually fast talkers.
zh: 推销员通常都很会说话。

en: The salesman demonstrated how to use the mincer.
zh: 那个推销员示范了如何使用绞肉机。

en: The salesman sold the article at an unreasonable price.
zh: 那个推销员以不合理的价格卖出了那件商品。

en: The salesman demonstrated how to use it.
zh: 那个推销员示范了如何使用它。

en: I'd like to use a safe.
zh: 我想用一个保险箱。

en: The salesman demonstrated how to use the machine.
zh: 那个推销员示范了如何使用这台机器。

en: Would you put this in the safety deposit box?
zh: 你能把这个放到保险箱里吗？

en: The Seine flows through Paris.
zh: 塞纳河流经巴黎。

en: We have safety deposit boxes.
zh: 我们有保险箱。

en: You're wearing your sweater inside out.
zh: 你的毛衣穿反了。

en: On an island in the Seine, there is a big church called Notre Dame.
zh: 在塞纳河的一个岛上，有一座大教堂叫做巴黎圣母院。

en: I think I had better have my sweater mended.
zh: 我想我最好把我的毛衣补一下。

en: Put on your sweater. Otherwise you will catch cold.
zh: 穿上你的毛衣。否则你会感冒的。

en: I caught my sweater on that nail.
zh: 我的毛衣被那个钉子刮住了。

en: The sweater shrank in the wash.
zh: 这件毛衣洗后缩水了。

en: What shall I put on over my sweater?
zh: 我应该在毛衣外面穿什么呢？

en: The sleeves of the sweater began to unravel.
zh: 这件毛衣的袖子开始脱线了。

en: I'm looking for a sweater.
zh: 我在找一件毛衣。

en: My sweater shrank in the wash.
zh: 我的毛衣洗后缩水了。

en: You should make the most of your ability.
zh: 你应该充分利用你的能力。

en: Not more than 40 percent of students go on university.
zh: 不超过百分之四十的学生会继续上大学。

en: At most 40 percent of students go on to university.
zh: 最多百分之四十的学生会继续上大学。

en: Seiko has no sisters.
zh: Seiko没有姐妹。
